## PopulatableEthersLiquity.sendTHUSD() method

Send thUSD tokens to an address.

**Signature:**

```typescript
sendTHUSD(toAddress: string, amount: Decimalish, overrides?: EthersTransactionOverrides): Promise<PopulatedEthersLiquityTransaction<void>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  toAddress | string | Address of receipient. |
|  amount | [Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md) | Amount of thUSD to send. |
|  overrides | [EthersTransactionOverrides](./lib-ethers.etherstransactionoverrides.md) |  |
